dcterms:creator: M. Mathew
D. Karatzas
C. Jawahar
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset comprising mostly extractive Visual QAs on single-page real-world administrative document images that include tables, forms, figures etc. Several data curation and quality control steps ensure a high quality and diversity across documents and questions.
dcterms:title: DocVQA

dcterms:creator: P. Pasupat
P. Liang
dcterms:description: This Table QA dataset comprises a collection of logical questions over HTML tables sourced from Wikipedia. The complexity of the questions demands semi-structured document understanding, compositional reasoning on a series of the tableâ€™s entries, including a variety of operations such as comparison, aggregation, etc.
dcterms:title: WikiTableQuestions (WTQ)

dcterms:creator: W. Chen
H. Wang
J. Chen
Y. Zhang
H. Wang
S. Li
X. Zhou
W. Y. Wang
dcterms:description: A big Natural Language Inference (NLI) dataset with high-quality human annotations designed for the task of fact verification given evidence in the form of Wikipedia tables, graphs, etc. Despite its binary classification nature with yes/no answers, verifying whether a textual hypothesis is entailed or refuted based on the evidence requires complex linguistic and symbolic reasoning capabilities.
dcterms:title: TabFact
